price: 天地万物只是他的，正教始终只归于他。难道你们舍安拉而敬畏他物吗？
arabic: وَلَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَهُ ٱلدِّينُ وَاصِبًاۚ أَفَغَيۡرَ ٱللَّهِ تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: walahu mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi walahu al-dīnu wāṣiban afaghayra al-lahi tattaqūna
